english.segment1: Wish I had what I needed. To be on my own. Cause I feel so defeated. And I'm feeling alone. And it all seems so helpless. And I have no plans. I'm a plane in the sunset. With no where to land. And all I see. It could never make me happy. And all my sandcastles. Spend their time collapsing
